model-value.desc: Model of the component defining if it is shown or hidden to the user; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

reveal.desc: Enable 'reveal' mode; Takes into account user scroll to temporarily show/hide header
reveal.desc_cn: 启用“显示”模式；考虑用户滚动以临时显示/隐藏标题

reveal-offset.desc: Amount of scroll (in pixels) that should trigger a 'reveal' state change
reveal-offset.desc_cn: 触发“显示”状态更改的滚动量（像素）

bordered.desc: Applies a default border to the component
bordered.desc_cn: 将默认边框应用于组件

elevated.desc: Adds a default shadow to the header

height-hint.desc: When using SSR, you can optionally hint of the height (in pixels) of the QHeader
height-hint.desc_cn: 当使用SSR时，您可以选择提示QHeader的高度（以像素为单位）

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component; Suggestion: QToolbar
default.desc_cn: 组件的devland unslotted内容中的默认插槽；建议：QToolbar
